When you open the app, you are presented with the home page. On the home page you will see various buttons. At the top there are three buttons; daily, weekly, and monthly. These are your buttons to navigate you to the page representing your meals for today, this week, or this month. By default, you are on the daily page.

On the daily page there are three buttons presented to you; breakfast, lunch, and dinner. These will take you to the search page where you can search for a recipe, or if you already have one set, it will display the recipe.

On the daily page there are three buttons presented to you; breakfast, lunch, and dinner. These will take you to the search page where you can search for a recipe, or if you already have one set, it will display the recipe.

If you are brought to the search page, you will be presented with a search bar as well as a search button. You can type in a word like “beef” or “chicken” and it will bring up various recipes relevant to your search. When you click on the recipe name in the list, it will open up a new page.

On this new page you will see a picture of the dish at the top, the title of the dish, two buttons: a heart and a share button, the ingredient list for the recipe, and then a button at the bottom named "make me.” If you click on the heart button, it will add the recipe to a list of your favorite recipes. You can un-click this button if you change your mind. If you click the share button it will allow you to share the recipe by email. If you click on the “make me” button, it will take you to the full recipe online. If you long click on an ingredient in the list, it will add it to your shopping list. This list contains all the ingredients you need to buy to make your recipe.

If you click on the weekly button on the home page, it will change and display this week and the recipes for breakfast, lunch, and dinner for each day. If you have a recipe set for a meal on any day, it will display the title of the recipe next to which meal it is for. If you do not have one, it will not display anything. When you click on any of the three meals for any day, it will have the same actions as the daily buttons: If there is no recipe you are taken to search, or it will display the recipe.

If you click on the monthly view button on the home page, it will change and display a calendar view of the month. It will highlight the current date on the calendar, but you can click on any day in the upcoming future. If you click on a day, it will show the breakfast, lunch, and dinner below the calendar. If you have a recipe set for a meal it will display the title of the recipe next to which meal it is for. If you do not have one, it will not display anything just like the weekly. When you click on any of the meals for that day, it will have the same actions as the daily buttons: If there is no recipe you are taken to search, or it will display the recipe.

To access the favorites list, shopping list, the search page, or go back to the home page, you can use the three lines in the top left corner. If you are on the favorites or the shopping list page and there is an item that you no longer want there, you can long click to remove the item.
